title: Arizona governor signs law for state to keep unclaimed crypto
body: Arizona Governor Katie Hobbs has signed a bill into law allowing the US state to keep unclaimed crypto and establish a “Bitcoin Reserve Fund” that won’t use any taxpayer money or state funds. Hobbs signed House Bill 2749 into law on May 7, which allows Arizona to claim ownership of abandoned digital assets if the owner fails to respond to communications within three years. The state’s custodians can stake the crypto to earn rewards or receive airdrops , which can then be deposited into what Arizona has called a Bitcoin and Digital Asset Reserve Fund. “This law ensures Arizona doesn’t leave value sitting on the table and puts us in a position to lead the country in how we secure, manage, and ultimately benefit from abandoned digital currency,” the bill’s sponsor, Jeff Weninger, said in a May 7 statement. Arizona House Representative Jeff Weninger’s statement on the signing of HB 2749 into law. Source: Jeff Weninger “We’ve built a structure that protects property rights, respects ownership, and gives the state tools to account for a new category of value in the economy,” Weninger added. On May 3, Hobbs vetoed a similar Bitcoin ( BTC ) reserve bill, Senate Bill 1025, which would have allowed the state to invest seized funds into Bitcoin, citing concerns over using public funds for "untested assets.” Hobbs’ move gives hope for future crypto bills Bitcoin Laws founder Julian Fahrer said on X that Hobbs’ signing of HB 2749 offers more hope that she may also sign Senate Bill 1373 , which is currently on her desk. Related: Bitcoin bros at ‘the club’ may stop US gov’t from buying BTC — Arthur Hayes SB 1373 would authorize Arizona’s treasurer, currently Kimberly Yee, to allocate up to 10% of Arizona’s Budget Stabilization Fund into Bitcoin. The bill’s passage in Arizona follows New Hampshire Governor Kelly Ayotte on May 6 signing House Bill 302 into law , allowing her state’s treasury to use funds to invest in cryptocurrencies with a market capitalization of more than $500 billion. Bitcoin is currently the only cryptocurrency that meets that threshold . Magazine: Crypto wanted to overthrow banks, and now it’s becoming them in stablecoin fight

title: Apple AI Search: Unlocking a New Era for Safari Browsing
body: The world of technology is constantly evolving, and few companies move the needle quite like Apple. For anyone tracking major shifts in the digital landscape, especially those relevant to innovation and market dynamics like in the cryptocurrency space, Apple’s next potential move is big news. Recent reports indicate that Apple is seriously considering integrating advanced AI search engines directly into its Safari browser. This isn’t just a minor update; it could fundamentally change how millions of users find information online and signal a significant strategic pivot for the tech giant. What Did Eddy Cue’s Testimony Reveal? The catalyst for this revelation came from a surprising source: the courtroom. During his testimony in the U.S. Justice Department’s ongoing antitrust lawsuit against Alphabet (Google’s parent company), Eddy Cue , Apple’s Senior Vice President of Services, made a notable disclosure. His appearance was primarily related to the massive, estimated $20 billion-a-year agreement that currently makes Google the default search engine across all Apple Safari devices. This deal is a cornerstone of Apple’s services revenue and a major factor in Google’s search dominance. However, Cue’s testimony went beyond just defending the Google partnership. He revealed that for the first time, searches conducted directly through Safari saw a decline last month. Cue attributed this change directly to the increasing public adoption and use of AI technologies, particularly AI-powered tools that can answer questions directly rather than just providing links. Why Is Apple Looking at AI Search Engines Now? Eddy Cue was quite clear about Apple’s motivation. He stated his belief that providers of AI-powered search will eventually replace traditional search engines like Google. This isn’t just a theoretical idea for Apple; it’s a future they believe is coming, and they want to be prepared. As a result, Apple is now “actively looking” at incorporating these advanced services into Safari. This strategic exploration suggests Apple recognizes the shifting landscape of information retrieval. Users are increasingly seeking summarized answers, conversational interfaces, and AI-driven insights, moving beyond the traditional list of ten blue links. By exploring integration with leading AI search engines , Apple aims to keep Safari relevant and valuable in this evolving environment. Which AI Search Engines Are on Apple’s Radar? According to the Bloomberg report based on Cue’s testimony, Apple is looking at several prominent players in the AI space. The companies mentioned are: OpenAI: Known for ChatGPT, OpenAI is a leader in large language models and conversational AI. Integrating their tech could bring powerful chat-like search capabilities to Safari. Perplexity: This company focuses specifically on building an AI-native search engine that provides direct answers and sources. Cue explicitly mentioned that Apple has already had discussions with Perplexity. This indicates concrete steps are being taken beyond just internal consideration. Anthropic: Creators of the Claude family of models, Anthropic is another major player focused on developing helpful and harmless AI. Their models are known for strong performance in understanding and generating text. Exploring these diverse providers suggests Apple is evaluating different approaches to AI search integration, looking for the best fit for the Safari user experience. What Benefits Could Safari AI Bring to Users? Integrating powerful Safari AI capabilities could unlock a host of new features and benefits for Apple users: Direct Answers: Instead of just showing links, the browser could provide concise, AI-generated answers to complex questions. Information Summarization: AI could quickly summarize long articles or web pages, saving users time. Conversational Search: Users could ask follow-up questions or refine their queries in a natural, conversational manner. Enhanced Research: AI could help users brainstorm ideas, find related information, or even generate outlines based on search topics. Seamless Integration: If implemented well, AI search features could feel like a natural extension of the Safari browsing experience. These potential features represent a significant leap beyond traditional keyword-based search. What Are the Challenges and Considerations for Apple? While the prospect of Apple AI Search is exciting, Eddy Cue also tempered expectations during his testimony. He noted that while Apple is actively looking at these services, they “probably won’t be the default” search option anytime soon. The primary reason he cited is that he believes these services “still need to improve.” Several challenges likely contribute to this cautious approach: Accuracy and Reliability: AI models can sometimes hallucinate or provide incorrect information. Ensuring a high level of accuracy for a core browsing function is critical for Apple’s reputation. Integration Complexity: Seamlessly integrating external AI services into the browser UI and backend infrastructure is technically challenging. Data Privacy and Security: Handling user queries and data with third-party AI services raises significant privacy considerations that Apple, known for its privacy focus, must address carefully. Cost: Running large language models for search is computationally expensive. Integrating these at scale for millions of users would involve substantial costs. Disruption to the Google Deal: Any significant shift towards alternative default search options could impact the lucrative agreement with Google, requiring delicate negotiation or a strategic phase-out. User Adoption: While AI is gaining traction, not all users may immediately embrace a radically different search experience. These factors explain why Apple is exploring but likely taking a measured approach before making any AI service the default in Apple Safari . The Broader Impact: How This Affects the Tech Landscape Apple’s exploration of AI Search Engines sends a strong signal to the entire tech industry. It validates the growing importance of AI-native search and puts further pressure on traditional search providers like Google to innovate rapidly. Google is, of course, heavily invested in its own AI search initiatives (like Search Generative Experience – SGE), but Apple potentially opening its platform to competitors like Perplexity and OpenAI could shake up the market dynamics significantly. For the cryptocurrency and broader tech community, this move is another data point showing how quickly AI is reshaping fundamental digital interactions. Just as AI is impacting areas like trading analysis, smart contract development, and blockchain security, it’s now poised to transform something as ubiquitous as web search. Monitoring how Apple navigates this shift provides insights into future tech trends and potential areas for innovation. Concluding Thoughts: A Glimpse into the Future of Safari Eddy Cue Testimony has provided a rare glimpse into Apple’s strategic thinking regarding the future of search on its platforms. Driven by observed changes in user behavior and a belief in the eventual dominance of AI, Apple is proactively exploring how to bring advanced Safari AI capabilities to its users. While challenges remain, and a default switch isn’t imminent, the fact that Apple is having discussions with companies like Perplexity underscores the seriousness of their intent. This move is not just about adding a new feature; it’s about ensuring Apple Safari remains a leading browser in an age where AI is fundamentally changing how we access and process information online. To learn more about the latest AI trends, explore our article on key developments shaping AI features.

title: USD1 Launch Ignites Market Buzz: Is WLFI the Next Target for HTX?
body: In the rapidly evolving landscape of the cryptocurrency market, efficiency and strategic foresight dictate the success of a platform. On May 6th, HTX once again demonstrated its astute operational prowess by becoming the first global exchange to list the USD1 stablecoin. As USD1 generates significant market traction, the next strategic move for HTX appears increasingly clear: WLFI, poised to potentially become the platform’s next high-impact asset. USD1 Debut: A Masterclass in HTX Agility and Execution On May 6th, HTX announced the global debut of the USD1 stablecoin, establishing itself as the pioneering exchange platform to support trading of this asset. USD1 is pegged 1:1 to the US dollar, backed by a reserve comprising short-term US Treasury bonds, cash, and cash equivalents. Custody is managed by the established institution BitGo, with regular audits conducted by third-party firms to ensure compliance and transparency. Currently deployed on both the Ethereum and BNB chains, USD1 has achieved a circulating market capitalization exceeding $2.1 billion, positioning it among the top five stablecoins in both centralized and decentralized markets, underscoring its considerable market potential. HTX listed USD1 with remarkable speed: an announcement on May 5th at 11:10, followed by deposit services commencing at 19:30 that evening, and the launch of spot trading pairs the next day at 11:00. Furthermore, the platform concurrently introduced a zero-fee promotion for the USD1/USDT spot trading pair, effective from 11:00 on May 6th, 2025, until 23:59 on December 31st, 2025. This initiative directly enhances the user experience. This series of efficient actions by HTX not only injects significant momentum into the adoption of USD1 but also lays a solid foundation for the further expansion of the WLFI ecosystem. Anticipating WLFI Listing: HTX’s Next Strategic Play? Following the USD1 launch, market attention has swiftly turned to the next potential high-profile project: WLFI. Launched on October 15th, 2024, WLFI successfully raised $550 million across two token sale rounds, attracting participation from over 85,000 investors. Notably, the project has garnered support from influential figures such as Justin Sun, DWF Labs, and Mike Dudas. Consequently, HTX’s next move regarding WLFI has become key topics within the crypto community. After the precedent-setting launch of USD1, could WLFI be the platform’s next significant offering? Historically, HTX has demonstrated a “bold yet meticulous” approach to new asset listings—venturesome in exploring emerging sectors while precisely gauging market sentiment. In the Q1 2025, HTX decisively listed TRUMP amidst market skepticism. This asset subsequently experienced a peak surge of 900%, rapidly generating market attention and user enthusiasm, effectively setting the stage for the surge in “celebrity coins.” Following this, HTX implemented a series of targeted marketing and promotional activities around TRUMP, capitalizing on the prevailing market trend. Similarly, HTX exhibited foresight in the AI concept coin sector, proactively listing VIRTUAL on the BASE chain (gaining 104%), AVAAI on the SOLANA chain (increasing by 256%), and LUNA (rising by 312%), providing investors with prime opportunities to capitalize on emerging trends. This strategy of “pioneering with prudence” has enabled HTX to consistently maintain a leading position in the competitive cryptocurrency market. In this context, the potential listing of WLFI on HTX appears to be a logical progression. Furthermore, the close relationship between Justin Sun and both WLFI and HTX strengthens this anticipation. From TRUMP to USD1, Justin Sun has played an active role in the WLFI ecosystem, with HTX naturally serving as a crucial platform for his strategic initiatives. Clearly, HTX’s approach to being a first mover is not arbitrary. Each selection is carefully considered, capitalizing on network connections, key junctures, and potential advantages. Of significant note, WLFI officially announced on May 7th its plan to test on-chain airdrop functionality via a Snapshot proposal. This initiative aims to distribute a small amount of USD1 to eligible $WLFI holders to verify the airdrop system and reward early supporters. This move not only enhances community engagement and project visibility but also adds further tangible basis and speculative potential for WLFI’s potential listing on HTX. WLFI First on HTX? Justin Sun’s Statement Ignites Excitement From TRUMP to USD1, HTX has consistently delivered “debut blockbuster” listings, providing a compelling prelude for the potential launch of WLFI. This time, Justin Sun’s direct statement has further elevated expectations for WLFI’s premiere on HTX. On May 6th, Eric Trump, son of Donald Trump, announced on social media, “#USD1 is now live on HTX!” Justin Sun subsequently retweeted and responded, “WLFI coming soon on HTX.” This single statement has generated significant excitement. It not only provides a clear indication of WLFI’s impending arrival on HTX, also further solidifies HTX’s position as a central platform for WLFI’s strategic execution. It is foreseeable that once WLFI is successfully listed on HTX, the combined influence of “ Justin Sun + HTX ” will likely trigger a new wave of market enthusiasm, potentially establishing WLFI as another “blockbuster” project for HTX in 2025. The post USD1 Launch Ignites Market Buzz: Is WLFI the Next Target for HTX? first appeared on HTX Square .

title: Safeguarding Trust: Proposed US Crypto Regulation Bill Targets Politician Trading
body: In a significant move aimed at bolstering public trust and preventing potential conflicts of interest, a new legislative proposal is making waves in the United States. This bill directly addresses concerns about government officials potentially profiting from digital assets while simultaneously shaping policy that impacts the cryptocurrency landscape. It’s a topic that touches upon the very core of ethical governance and the rapidly evolving world of digital finance. Why the Push for a Politician Crypto Ban? The core of the proposed legislation, championed by New York State Representative Ritchie Torres, is straightforward: prohibit key federal personnel and their immediate families from trading or otherwise profiting from digital assets. As reported by Crypto in America host Eleanor Terrett via X, this isn’t just about preventing lucrative personal trades; it’s about ensuring that those who hold positions of power aren’t using insider knowledge or their influence over policy to gain an unfair advantage in the volatile digital asset market. Think about it: Members of Congress, the President, the Vice President, and countless federal employees are privy to discussions, draft legislation, and regulatory decisions that can dramatically affect the value of cryptocurrencies, stablecoins, and even memecoins. Allowing them to trade these assets creates a clear potential for crypto insider trading – using non-public information for personal gain. This erodes public confidence and calls into question the integrity of the legislative and regulatory processes surrounding digital assets. The increasing integration of digital assets into the global financial system means that decisions made in Washington D.C. have real-world consequences for investors and the industry. A politician crypto ban is seen by proponents as a necessary step to align the rules governing digital asset trading with those already in place for traditional securities, where similar restrictions on insider trading and potential conflicts of interest exist for government officials. Who Would This Federal Employee Crypto Ban Affect? The scope of the proposed bill is broad, targeting those at the highest levels of government down to various federal employees. Here’s a breakdown of the individuals and groups explicitly mentioned as being subject to the prohibition: The President of the United States The Vice President of the United States All Members of Congress (Senators and Representatives) Federal Employees (This category is vast and would likely require specific definitions within the bill itself, but it aims to cover those working across various government agencies) Immediate Family Members of all the above individuals Defining “immediate family members” is often a critical detail in such legislation, typically including spouses, dependent children, and sometimes other close relatives. The intent is to prevent officials from simply trading through proxies to circumvent the rules. The bill aims to cover a wide range of digital assets, including: Major cryptocurrencies (like Bitcoin, Ethereum, etc.) Stablecoins (digital assets pegged to stable values like the USD) Memecoins (cryptocurrencies often based on internet memes or social trends, known for high volatility) Presumably, other forms of digital assets like NFTs (Non-Fungible Tokens), depending on the final language of the bill. The inclusion of memecoins highlights the bill’s intent to cover the full spectrum of digital assets, regardless of their underlying technology or perceived value, focusing purely on the potential for speculative profit and conflicts of interest. Addressing Digital Asset Ethics in Government The push for this legislation underscores a growing concern about digital asset ethics within governmental bodies. As cryptocurrency becomes more mainstream, the ethical lines regarding officials’ personal investments become blurrier, especially when those officials are involved in crafting regulations or investigating the industry. This bill attempts to draw a clear line in the sand. Consider the potential scenarios: A Member of Congress holds a significant position in a particular altcoin and then sits on a committee discussing legislation that could directly benefit or harm that altcoin’s ecosystem. A Treasury official is involved in drafting stablecoin regulations while their spouse actively trades stablecoins. An SEC employee has investments in a cryptocurrency project that the agency is investigating. These situations, whether or not actual wrongdoing occurs, create the appearance of impropriety and can severely damage public trust in government institutions and the fairness of the financial system. By enacting a politician crypto ban , the bill seeks to proactively eliminate these potential ethical minefields. Comparing Current Rules to Proposed US Crypto Regulation Currently, rules regarding federal officials’ investments vary. While there are ethics guidelines and laws like the STOCK Act (Stop Trading on Congressional Knowledge Act) that require disclosure of stock trades and aim to prevent insider trading in traditional markets, the application to digital assets has been less clear or consistent across all levels and branches of government. Some agencies may have internal policies, but a comprehensive, federal-level prohibition specifically for digital assets affecting all branches and their families is a significant step. Here’s a simplified comparison: Aspect Current Situation (General) Proposed Bill (Ritchie Torres Bill) Scope of Assets Focus on traditional securities; crypto rules less uniform/explicit. Explicitly includes cryptocurrencies, stablecoins, memecoins, etc. Covered Individuals Varies by role/agency; STOCK Act covers Congress/Exec branch officials for stocks. Covers President, VP, Congress, Federal Employees, AND their immediate families. Action Prohibited Insider trading on traditional securities; disclosure requirements for trades. Trading or profiting from digital assets (effectively a ban on holding/trading speculative assets). Primary Goal Prevent insider trading & increase transparency for traditional assets. Prevent conflicts of interest & insider trading specifically related to digital assets; enhance public trust. This table highlights how the proposed bill specifically targets the unique challenges presented by digital assets within the context of governmental ethics and US crypto regulation . Challenges and Benefits of a Federal Employee Crypto Ban Like any significant legislation, this bill faces potential challenges and offers clear benefits. Potential Challenges: Definition Clarity: Precisely defining “digital assets” and “immediate family” in a way that is comprehensive yet enforceable can be complex. Enforcement: Monitoring compliance across a vast number of federal employees and their families would require robust systems and resources. How would non-disclosure or violations be detected and penalized? Scope: Should the ban apply to all federal employees, or only those in roles directly related to financial regulation or policy-making? A broad ban might be seen as overly restrictive for employees whose jobs have no connection to digital assets. Existing Holdings: What happens to digital assets already held by these individuals or their families? Would they be forced to sell, or would they be allowed to hold them without further trading? Potential Benefits: Enhanced Public Trust: By removing the potential for personal gain from policy decisions, the bill can significantly improve public confidence in the fairness and integrity of US crypto regulation . Reduced Conflicts of Interest: Directly addresses the ethical dilemmas posed by officials trading assets they regulate or legislate upon. Level Playing Field: Helps ensure that policy is made based on sound principles rather than potentially being influenced by personal financial interests. Sets a Precedent: Could set a standard for ethical conduct regarding novel asset classes in the future. The debate around these points will be crucial as the bill potentially moves through the legislative process. Actionable Insights for the Crypto Community What does this mean for the average person interested in crypto or involved in the industry? Stay Informed: Keep an eye on this bill and similar legislative efforts. The details of who is covered and what is prohibited matter. Understand the “Why”: Recognize that this isn’t necessarily an attack on crypto itself, but rather an effort to apply ethical standards to government officials within the context of this new asset class. Advocate for Clarity: If you are part of the crypto industry, engage with policymakers to ensure that any resulting legislation is clear, fair, and effectively addresses ethical concerns without unduly hindering legitimate activity or innovation. Monitor Market Reactions: While unlikely to cause massive immediate shifts, the passage of such a bill could be interpreted by some as a sign of increasing regulatory focus, which can influence market sentiment. The conversation around digital asset ethics and preventing crypto insider trading at the governmental level is vital for the long-term health and legitimacy of the cryptocurrency market. This proposed bill is a significant step in that ongoing discussion. A Step Towards Ethical Governance in the Digital Age The proposed bill from Representative Ritchie Torres represents a clear effort to apply traditional ethical standards to the modern world of digital assets. By seeking to implement a comprehensive politician crypto ban and extend it to federal employee crypto holdings, the legislation aims to prevent conflicts of interest and potential crypto insider trading , thereby safeguarding public trust in US crypto regulation . While challenges related to definition and enforcement exist, the benefits of clearer ethical boundaries for those in power are undeniable. As this bill progresses, it will be a key indicator of how the U.S. government intends to navigate the intersection of public service, personal finance, and the burgeoning digital asset economy. To learn more about the latest US crypto regulation trends, explore our article on key developments shaping digital asset ethics and institutional adoption.

title: Bitcoin Price Eyes $100K as Bulls Regain Momentum, Buy Dips?
body: Bitcoin price started a fresh increase above the $96,500 zone. BTC is rising and might aim for a move toward the $100,000 resistance. Bitcoin started a decent increase above the $96,500 resistance zone. The price is trading above $96,500 and the 100 hourly Simple moving average. There was a break above a connecting bearish trend line with resistance at $97,200 on the hourly chart of the BTC/USD pair (data feed from Kraken). BTC formed a base and was able to clear the $95,000 resistance zone. The bulls even pushed the price above $96,500. A high is formed at $98,292 and the price is now consolidating gains above the 23.6% Fib retracement level of the upward move from the $95,824 swing low to the $98,292 high. Bitcoin is now trading above $97,500 and the 100 hourly Simple moving average . On the upside, immediate resistance is near the $98,250 level. The first key resistance is near the $98,500 level. The next key resistance could be $98,800. A close above the $98,800 resistance might send the price further higher. In the stated case, the price could rise and test the $99,500 resistance level. title: Bitcoin miner Core Scientific posts $580M Q1 profit but misses revenue estimates
body: Nasdaq-listed Bitcoin mining firm Core Scientific Inc. posted a net profit of $580 million with its first quarter results, but missed analyst revenue estimates after a drop in its mining profits. Core Scientific’s Q1 2025 results, shared on May 7, saw it more than double its $210 million net income from the year-ago quarter, while its total revenue reached $79.5 million, missing Zacks analysts' estimates by 8.11%, and falling from its $179.3 million in revenues for Q1 2024. The firm’s primary source of revenue came from $67.2 million in self-mining revenue , $3.8 million in hosted mining revenue, and $8.6 million in colocation, formerly listed as high-performance computing (HPC) hosting. Source: Core Scientific Core Scientific said its drop in Bitcoin ( BTC ) mined and revenue was due to the halving on April 20, 2024, when mining rewards were cut from 6.25 BTC to 3.125 BTC, and its operational shift to HPC hosting, primarily used for artificial intelligence. However, the losses were partially offset by a 74% increase in the average price of Bitcoin and a 33% decrease in power costs due to lower rates and usage. As part of its HPC hosting shift, Core Scientific inked a deal in February with AI startup CoreWeave for a $1.2 billion data center expansion. As a result, Core Scientific anticipates entering 2026 with annualized colocation revenue of $360 million. Inflection point for miners in AI shift Core Scientific CEO Adam Sullivan said in a statement that its first quarter was an “inflection point,” as the firm positioned itself at the “center of one of the most important shifts in modern computing,” as the demand for high-performance data infrastructure has accelerated. Related: Robinhood beats Q1 estimates despite revenue, crypto trading dip Shares in Core Scientific (CORZ) closed May 7 trading down 1%, falling to $8.90, according to Google Finance. However, they jumped over 3% to trade at $9.24 after the bell. Core Scientific’s stock has jumped slightly after the bell, after dropping during the regular session. Source: Google Finance In an August report, asset manager VanEck estimated that if publicly traded Bitcoin mining companies shifted 20% of their energy capacity to AI and HPC by 2027, they could increase additional yearly profits by $13.9 billion over 13 years. Riot Platforms appointed three new directors to its board in February, one of whom has experience converting Bitcoin mining assets toward HPC. Hive Digital, Hut 8 and Iris Energy converted part of their operations to HPC and AI last year, and TeraWulf sold its stake in a Bitcoin mining facility for $92 million in October, with the proceeds marked for hosting AI and building HPC data centers. Magazine: Adam Back says Bitcoin price cycle is ’10x bigger’, has ’empathy’ for ETF buyers

title: CME FedWatch Reveals Crucial Stability: What Fed Rate Holds Mean for Crypto
body: Hey there, crypto enthusiasts and market watchers! Ever feel like the world of traditional finance and central banks is miles away from the fast-paced crypto universe? Think again! Decisions made by institutions like the U.S. Federal Reserve can send significant ripples through all asset classes, including Bitcoin, Ethereum, and your favorite altcoins. Right now, a key tool used by traders worldwide, the CME FedWatch tool, is flashing a very clear signal about the upcoming FOMC Meeting in May. According to the latest data, there’s an overwhelming probability – a staggering 97.7% chance – that the Fed will choose to keep Interest Rates exactly where they are. Only a tiny 2.3% chance is assigned to a modest 0.25% rate cut. But what does this high probability hold mean, and more importantly, what could be its Crypto Market Impact ? Decoding the CME FedWatch Tool: Your Window into Fed Expectations Before we dive deeper into the implications of this prediction, let’s quickly touch on what the CME FedWatch tool actually is. It’s not a crystal ball, but it’s pretty close when it comes to gauging market sentiment about the Federal Reserve ‘s next move on Interest Rates . The tool uses real-time data from CME Group’s Fed Funds futures contracts. These are financial instruments where traders essentially bet on the future level of the federal funds rate. By looking at the pricing of these contracts, the FedWatch tool calculates the market’s perceived probability of different rate outcomes at upcoming FOMC Meeting s. It’s a powerful snapshot of collective market expectation, providing valuable insight into how traders are positioning themselves. The May FOMC Meeting Prediction: Stability on the Horizon? The headline from the CME FedWatch tool is loud and clear for the May FOMC Meeting : Stability is the overwhelming expectation. Let’s break down the numbers reported: Probability of Rates Held Steady: 97.7% Probability of a 0.25% Rate Cut: 2.3% Probability of a 0.25% Rate Hike: 0.0% (Effectively zero) This data strongly suggests that the market has largely priced in a scenario where the Federal Reserve maintains the current target range for the federal funds rate (which is currently 5.25% to 5.50%). This level has been in place since July 2023. What does ‘holding rates steady’ mean? It means the Fed isn’t making borrowing money cheaper or more expensive, at least not directly through this key policy rate. They are choosing to observe the current economic conditions and the impact of their previous rate hikes before making another move. Why is the Federal Reserve Leaning Towards a Hold? The Federal Reserve ‘s decisions on Interest Rates are guided by its dual mandate from Congress: to promote maximum employment and stable prices (low inflation). Several economic factors likely contribute to the current high probability of a hold according to the CME FedWatch : Stubborn Inflation: While inflation has come down significantly from its peak, recent data points (like the Consumer Price Index – CPI) have shown it’s not cooling as quickly as the Fed would like. This makes rate cuts less likely in the immediate future. Resilient Labor Market: The U.S. jobs market remains relatively strong, with low unemployment. A robust labor market can contribute to wage pressures, which can, in turn, fuel inflation. A strong economy gives the Fed less urgency to cut rates to stimulate growth. Economic Growth: The U.S. economy has shown surprising resilience. Stronger-than-expected growth means the economy can handle higher Interest Rates for longer without tipping into recession, reducing the need for stimulative cuts. Waiting for More Data: The Fed often prefers to see a consistent trend in economic data before making a policy shift. Holding rates allows them time to assess upcoming reports on inflation, employment, and consumer spending. These factors, among others, paint a picture where the Federal Reserve sees the current monetary policy stance as appropriate for now, justifying the high probability of a hold reflected in the CME FedWatch data. The Ripple Effect of Interest Rates: How Fed Policy Shapes Markets Understanding the Crypto Market Impact of Fed decisions requires first understanding how Interest Rates generally affect financial markets. Higher interest rates typically make borrowing more expensive for businesses and consumers. This can slow down economic activity. They also make less risky investments, like government bonds or savings accounts, more attractive compared to riskier assets. Conversely, lower interest rates make borrowing cheaper, encouraging spending and investment. They also make riskier assets relatively more appealing as investors seek higher returns than those offered by low-yield safe investments. Traditional Markets: Stocks: Higher rates can negatively impact stock valuations as future earnings are discounted at a higher rate, and borrowing costs for companies increase. Lower rates generally support higher stock prices. Bonds: Bond prices typically move inversely to interest rates. When rates rise, the value of existing lower-yield bonds falls. When rates fall, existing higher-yield bonds become more valuable. U.S. Dollar: Higher interest rates can make the U.S. dollar more attractive to foreign investors seeking higher yields, potentially strengthening the dollar. Crucial Question: What Does a Fed Rate Hold Mean for the Crypto Market Impact? Now for the part most relevant to you: the potential Crypto Market Impact . The relationship between Interest Rates and crypto isn’t always direct or perfectly correlated, but there are clear mechanisms at play. Cryptocurrencies are often viewed as risk assets, similar to growth stocks or venture capital. When Interest Rates are high and rising, the cost of capital increases across the board. This can: Reduce Liquidity: Less cheap money flowing through the system can mean less capital available to flow into riskier assets like crypto. Increase Opportunity Cost: With higher yields available on safer investments (like Treasury bills), the relative appeal of volatile assets like crypto might decrease for some investors. Impact Tech/Growth Narratives: Many crypto projects are tied to technological innovation and growth narratives, which can be more sensitive to higher borrowing costs and tighter financial conditions. Given the CME FedWatch ‘s prediction of a hold, here’s how the 97.7% probability might influence the Crypto Market Impact : Potential Positives (or ‘Less Negative’): Stability is Priced In: A hold is the highly expected outcome. This means the market has likely already adjusted to the current rate environment. Surprises (like an unexpected hike) tend to cause more volatility than expected outcomes. Avoids Further Tightening: While not a cut, a hold means the Fed isn’t actively making conditions *more* restrictive right now. This avoids adding fresh downward pressure that a hike would likely cause. Focus Shifts to Future Cuts: With a hold expected now, market attention might increasingly turn to *when* the first rate cut might occur later in the year, which is generally seen as bullish for risk assets in the medium term. Potential Negatives (or ‘Continued Headwinds’): No Immediate Stimulus: A hold means no new influx of cheap money into the system, which is what a rate cut would provide. The current higher-rate environment continues to be a factor. Economic Uncertainty Lingers: The reason *why* the Fed is holding (persistent inflation, etc.) indicates underlying economic challenges that could still weigh on investor sentiment for risk assets. Market Could React to Nuances: While the rate decision itself might be a non-event if it’s a hold, the Fed’s statement and Chair Powell’s press conference could contain forward guidance or economic assessments that *do* surprise the market and trigger volatility in crypto. So, while the high probability of a hold suggests the immediate decision itself might not be a shocker for the crypto market, the context surrounding that decision – particularly the Fed’s commentary on inflation and future policy path – will be crucial. Traders will be listening intently for any hints about the timing of potential future rate cuts. Actionable Insights for the Crypto Investor Based on the CME FedWatch outlook and the potential Crypto Market Impact : Expect the Expected (for the Decision): Don’t necessarily anticipate massive volatility *solely* from the rate decision itself if it’s the predicted hold. Focus on the Commentary: Pay close attention to the official FOMC statement released alongside the decision and, more importantly, Chair Powell’s subsequent press conference. Look for language regarding the economic outlook, inflation trends, and any hints about the future path of Interest Rates . Monitor Economic Data: The Fed is data-dependent. Keep an eye on upcoming inflation reports (CPI, PCE) and jobs data, as these will influence future Fed decisions and thus potential Crypto Market Impact later in the year. Risk Management: Regardless of the Fed’s decision, crypto remains a volatile asset class. Maintain a diversified portfolio and practice sound risk management based on your own financial situation and investment goals. In Summary: Navigating the Predicted Hold The latest CME FedWatch data paints a clear picture: the market is overwhelmingly confident (97.7% probability) that the Federal Reserve will keep Interest Rates unchanged at the upcoming May FOMC Meeting . This expectation is likely driven by persistent inflation and a resilient economy, giving the Fed room to maintain its current restrictive stance. For the crypto market, this predicted hold means the immediate environment of higher borrowing costs and tighter liquidity conditions is expected to continue. While the decision itself might not cause major waves if it aligns with expectations, the Fed’s accompanying commentary on the economy and future policy will be key drivers of market sentiment and potential Crypto Market Impact in the days and weeks following the meeting. Stay informed and watch the data closely! To learn more about the latest crypto market trends and how global economic factors like Interest Rates are shaping the landscape, explore our article on key developments shaping Bitcoin and the broader digital asset space.

title: Bitcoin returns to $98K as Fed holds rates steady despite Trump’s demand
body: Bitcoin has reclaimed $98,000 for the first time in almost three months after the US Federal Reserve said it would keep interest rates the same for another month. The Fed’s decision to keep interest rates unchanged comes despite mounting pressure from US President Donald Trump, who just weeks ago threatened to fire Fed chair Jerome Powell for being “too late” in cutting rates. Fed cites higher unemployment, inflation risk Powell said on May 7 that the Federal Reserve rate-setting committee held rates in the 4.25% to 4.50% range due to the rising risks of higher unemployment and higher inflation. He added inflation has “come down a great deal but has been running above our 2% longer objective.” Powell said surveys in households and businesses showed a “sharp decline in sentiment” mainly due to concerns over Trump’s trade policy. However, Powell said that “despite heightened uncertainty, the economy is still in a solid position.” In the days leading up to the announcement, data from CME Group’s FedWatch Tool indicated that the futures market expected minimal odds of a rate cut . Powell said the unemployment rate remains low, and the labor market is “at or near maximum employment.” The market expects the Fed to drop the Fed funds rate to 3.6% by the end of 2025. Bitcoin fell below $96,000 before retracing back above $98,000 just hours later on May 7. Source: CoinMarketCap Bitcoin ( BTC ) dropped below $97,000 to $95,866 after Powell’s speech, but it shot up to tap $98,000 for the first time since Feb. 21 just hours later. Bitcoin momentum has been building, with the Crypto Fear & Greed Index returning to “Greed” territory, and spot Bitcoin exchange-traded funds (ETFs) posting inflows of almost $4.41 billion since March 26 . Related: Bitcoin price rallied 1,550% the last time the ‘BTC risk-off’ metric fell this low On March 9, network economist Timothy Peterson warned that if the Fed holds off on rate cuts in 2025, it may cause a broader market downturn, potentially dragging Bitcoin back toward $70,000. Peterson’s forecast came after Powell said in March that “we do not need to be in a hurry and are well-positioned to wait for greater clarity.” Magazine: Adam Back says Bitcoin price cycle is’ 10x bigger’, has’ empathy’ for ETF buyers This article does not contain investment advice or recommendations. Every investment and trading move involves risk, and readers should conduct their own research when making a decision.

title: OpenAI Launches Ambitious Global AI Partnerships for Infrastructure Growth
body: In the rapidly evolving landscape of technology, where advancements in artificial intelligence are setting the pace, a significant move by a leading AI firm warrants attention, particularly for those tracking major shifts in the digital realm like cryptocurrency enthusiasts. OpenAI has announced a strategic initiative aimed at fostering global AI adoption and building essential infrastructure. This program signals a new era of collaboration between private AI companies and public entities, potentially reshaping the future of AI accessibility and development worldwide. The program, dubbed “OpenAI for Countries,” is designed to work directly with national governments to accelerate the creation of local AI capabilities and infrastructure. Understanding OpenAI for Countries and AI Infrastructure The core objective of the “OpenAI for Countries” program is straightforward yet ambitious: to enable OpenAI to better serve its international customers by establishing local foundations. This involves more than just offering software; it’s about laying the groundwork for AI to function effectively within diverse national contexts. A primary focus is the development of robust AI infrastructure . Building data centers: This is a critical component, requiring significant investment and technical expertise to handle the immense computational needs of AI models. Enhancing connectivity: Ensuring high-speed, reliable network access is vital for distributing AI services and processing data efficiently. Securing power supply: AI data centers consume vast amounts of energy, necessitating stable and sustainable power solutions. By partnering with governments, OpenAI aims to navigate the complexities of developing such infrastructure within different regulatory and environmental landscapes. This collaborative approach is expected to speed up deployment and tailor infrastructure to specific national requirements. The Role of Government Partnerships in AI Development Why are government partnerships central to this initiative? Governments possess unique resources and authority necessary for large-scale infrastructure projects. They can facilitate access to land, permits, and necessary utilities, and often play a key role in shaping national digital strategies. OpenAI’s program seeks to leverage these capabilities to achieve mutual goals. These partnerships extend beyond just physical infrastructure. Governments can assist in: Customizing OpenAI products: Tailoring models like ChatGPT for local languages, cultural nuances, and specific national use cases (e.g., public services, education, healthcare). Navigating regulations: Ensuring AI deployment complies with national data privacy laws, ethical guidelines, and security standards. Promoting adoption: Encouraging the use of AI across government agencies, educational institutions, and local industries. Funding for these projects will be a shared responsibility, with contributions coming from both OpenAI and the participating governments. This co-funding model underscores the commitment required from both sides to make these initiatives successful. Driving AI Development and Global Reach A stated goal of AI development through this program is to “spread democratic AI.” This phrase suggests an effort to promote Western AI models, particularly OpenAI’s, as alternatives to competitors, likely those from China. By establishing a local presence and customizing its offerings, OpenAI aims to make its technology more accessible, relevant, and appealing to countries globally. This strategic push has geopolitical implications, positioning AI technology as a tool of influence and a reflection of different technological philosophies. Connecting to Project Stargate: Expanding OpenAI’s Vision The “OpenAI for Countries” program appears closely linked to OpenAI’s rumored large-scale data center initiative, known as Project Stargate . Project Stargate is reportedly a massive undertaking aimed at building extensive data center capacity, potentially involving significant investment and partnerships, possibly including Microsoft. While initially focused on expanding infrastructure within the U.S., the “OpenAI for Countries” program suggests that Project Stargate’s ambitions extend internationally. It is plausible that the infrastructure built under Project Stargate could support the international projects in the “OpenAI for Countries” program, or that funding sources for Stargate might also contribute to the international expansion efforts. This integrated approach highlights OpenAI’s commitment to securing the vast computational resources needed to train and run increasingly powerful AI models on a global scale. Benefits and Challenges The program offers potential benefits: Accelerated AI adoption and integration in participating countries. Customized AI solutions better suited to local needs. Growth of local technological expertise and job creation. Increased global competition in the AI space. However, challenges exist: Navigating diverse national regulations and political landscapes. Securing substantial and consistent funding from governments. Addressing concerns about data sovereignty and privacy. Ensuring equitable access and preventing a digital divide within countries. Managing competition from other global AI providers. Conclusion OpenAI’s “OpenAI for Countries” program marks a significant strategic shift towards deep international engagement through direct partnerships with governments. By focusing on building local AI infrastructure and customizing its products, OpenAI aims to expand its global footprint, promote its vision of “democratic AI,” and potentially leverage large-scale initiatives like Project Stargate . This ambitious undertaking highlights the increasing importance of government partnerships in shaping the future of AI development and underscores the global race to build the necessary technological foundations for the AI era. The success of these initial 10 projects will likely provide valuable insights into the feasibility and impact of this collaborative model on the worldwide adoption of advanced AI technologies. To learn more about the latest AI market trends, explore our article on key developments shaping AI features.

title: Binance’s BNB Could Hit $2,775 By 2028, Predicts Standard Chartered
body: Standard Chartered has initiated formal coverage of Binance’s exchange token, BNB, and set out one of the industry’s most detailed long-term trajectories for the asset. In a research note shared with The Block, Geoffrey Kendrick, the bank’s global head of digital-asset research, argues that the token price could accelerate from roughly $600 today to $1,275 by 2025 and $2,775 by 2028, before “plateauing” through 2029. BNB Could Spike By 360% The path implies a gain of more than 360% from current levels and, crucially, situates the token in what Kendrick calls “a benchmark-like role” inside the wider crypto capital structure. “BNB has traded almost exactly in line with an unweighted basket of Bitcoin and Ethereum since May 2021 in terms of both returns and volatility,” Kendrick wrote. “We expect this relationship to continue to hold, driving the price from around $600 currently to $2,775 by end-2028.” Related Reading: BNB Textbook Support Rebound Sets The Stage for More Upside – See How Standard Chartered’s broader outlook is unabashedly bullish on the majors: Bitcoin is projected to reach $200,000 in 2025 and $500,000 in 2028, while Ethereum is pencilled in at $4,000 and $7,500 over the same horizons. When those forecasts are translated into cross-asset ratios, they reveal subtle shifts in market share. The BTC-BNB ratio—how many BNB one Bitcoin can buy—is expected to tick up from 157 in 2025 to 180 by 2027, then hold steady, implying that Bitcoin’s dollar appreciation is likely to outrun BNB’s. By contrast, the ETH-BNB ratio is seen slipping from 3.14 in 2025 to 2.70 in 2027, signalling that Ethereum may outperform BNB, but more gently than Bitcoin will. Kendrick acknowledges that BNB “may underperform Bitcoin and Ether both in real terms and as measured by market cap in circulation,” yet he contends that its deflationary tokenomics and deep linkage to the world’s largest centralized exchange “support its long-term value.” The research note scrutinises BNB Chain’s architecture. Its “proof-of-staked authority” model rotates just 45 validators every 24 hours—a sharp contrast to Ethereum’s million-plus validator set. Kendrick describes BNB Chain as “highly centralised relative to other chains,” adding that its developer activity has “stagnated” since the 2021 DeFi surge and now trails networks such as Avalanche and Ethereum. Related Reading: BNB Bulls Target $644 As Classic Chart Formation Emerges Even so, forthcoming technical milestones are expected to expand the ecosystem’s resilience. Kendrick cites the recently completed Pascal hard fork and the looming Maxwell upgrade, due in June, as examples of “incremental but meaningful” incentives for developers. On the demand side, the token’s fortunes remain tethered to Binance’s trading engine. Holders receive tiered fee discounts calculated on their token balance and 30-day volume—a mechanically enforced use-case that has so far “helped the BNB Chain retain activity even as competition from other ecosystems like Solana grows,” Kendrick notes. PancakeSwap, the dominant decentralised exchange on BNB Chain, amplifies that liquidity loop. Meanwhile, regular token burns, coupled with the fixed-limit supply, underpin a structural deflation that Standard Chartered says justifies the premium BNB commands on its market-cap-to-GDP valuation screen—currently “rich” by the bank’s preferred metric. At press time, BNB traded at $605. Featured image created with DALL.E, chart from TradingView.com

title: Urgent: Fed Interest Rate Frozen – What This Means for Your Crypto Portfolio
body: Big news from the world of finance that directly impacts your digital assets! The Federal Reserve , specifically its Federal Open Market Committee (FOMC), just announced a significant decision regarding the Fed Interest Rate . In a move many anticipated but still carries weight, the benchmark interest rate has been frozen. What does this mean for the economy, and more importantly, what could be the Crypto Market Impact ? Despite a backdrop of seemingly solid economic indicators, the central bank opted for a pause rather than another hike. This decision wasn’t made lightly and comes with careful consideration of the current Economic Outlook and incoming Inflation Data . Why Did the Federal Reserve Freeze the Fed Interest Rate? The official statement from the FOMC provides insight into their thinking. While recent months have shown a stable, low unemployment rate and a resilient labor market, the persistent issue of high inflation remains a concern. This creates a complex picture for policymakers. Here’s a breakdown of the key factors influencing the Federal Reserve’s decision: Stable Labor Market: The unemployment rate has held steady at a low level, and job growth has been consistent, indicating underlying economic strength. Stubborn Inflation: Despite previous rate hikes, inflation remains above the Fed’s target, eroding purchasing power. Increased Uncertainty: The FOMC statement explicitly noted a rise in uncertainty regarding the future Economic Outlook . This includes concerns about both the risk of inflation staying high and the potential for increased unemployment. This pause signals a shift from a clear tightening bias to a more data-dependent approach. The Fed will now take more time to assess how past rate hikes are affecting the economy before making further adjustments. Understanding the Economic Outlook and Inflation Data The economic landscape is giving mixed signals. On one hand, consumer spending and business investment show some resilience. On the other hand, the full impact of the rapid rate hikes over the past year is still filtering through the system. The lag effect of monetary policy means that the economy might still slow down considerably in the coming months. The Inflation Data is particularly crucial. While headline inflation has cooled somewhat, core inflation (which excludes volatile food and energy prices) has been stickier. The Fed needs to see clear evidence that inflation is sustainably moving towards its 2% target before it can consider cutting rates. The increased uncertainty mentioned by the Federal Reserve stems from various factors, including global economic conditions, geopolitical events, and the unpredictable nature of how inflation will evolve. This complex Economic Outlook makes forecasting difficult for everyone, including investors. What is the Potential Crypto Market Impact? This is the question on every crypto investor’s mind. How does the Fed Interest Rate decision influence Bitcoin, Ethereum, and the broader digital asset space? Historically, periods of aggressive rate hikes have often correlated with downward pressure on risk assets, including cryptocurrencies. Higher interest rates make traditional savings and bonds more attractive, potentially drawing capital away from speculative investments like crypto. However, a pause could be interpreted in different ways: Potential Positive: Some might see the pause as a signal that the tightening cycle is nearing its end, potentially leading to increased liquidity in financial markets. More liquidity could flow into risk assets like crypto. Potential Negative: Others might view the pause as an acknowledgment that the economy is weakening significantly, increasing the risk of a recession. A recession could lead to broader market sell-offs, affecting crypto. Volatility: The uncertainty highlighted by the Fed is likely to translate into continued volatility across all markets, including crypto. Price swings could be more pronounced as markets react to every piece of new Inflation Data and economic news. The Crypto Market Impact will ultimately depend on how the economic narrative unfolds from here. Will inflation cool rapidly, allowing the Fed to consider cuts sooner? Or will the economy weaken significantly, leading to recession fears dominating the narrative? Challenges and Risks Highlighted by the Fed The FOMC statement didn’t just announce a pause; it also pointed to rising risks. Specifically, they highlighted that the risks of both high unemployment and high inflation have increased. This is a delicate balancing act for the Federal Reserve . Managing the Economic Outlook involves navigating these dual risks. Aggressively fighting inflation with higher rates could trigger a sharp rise in unemployment. Conversely, easing policy too soon to support employment could allow inflation to become entrenched. These macroeconomic risks are fundamental drivers of market sentiment. Investors in the crypto space need to be aware that the broader economic environment, shaped by the Federal Reserve’s actions and the resulting Inflation Data and employment figures, will continue to play a significant role in crypto price movements. Actionable Insights for Crypto Investors Given the current climate of uncertainty following the Fed Interest Rate decision, what steps can crypto investors consider? Firstly, stay informed. Keep a close eye on future Inflation Data , employment reports, and subsequent statements from the Federal Reserve . These will provide clues about the likely direction of monetary policy. Secondly, consider your risk tolerance. The increased uncertainty in the Economic Outlook means that market volatility is likely to persist. Ensure your portfolio allocation aligns with how much risk you are comfortable taking. Thirdly, think long-term. While short-term price movements are influenced by macro events like the Fed Interest Rate decision, the long-term potential of blockchain technology and specific crypto projects is a separate consideration. Dollar-cost averaging can be a strategy to navigate volatile periods. Finally, diversification is key. Don’t put all your eggs in one basket. Diversifying across different crypto assets and potentially other asset classes can help mitigate risk. Compelling Summary: Navigating the Pause The Federal Reserve’s decision to freeze the Fed Interest Rate marks a pivotal moment. It reflects a complex Economic Outlook where a strong labor market coexists with persistent high inflation and rising uncertainty. The central bank is now in a wait-and-see mode, heavily reliant on future Inflation Data and other economic indicators. For the crypto market, this pause introduces both potential upside from hopes of peak rates and potential downside from increased recession risks. The Crypto Market Impact will be closely tied to how these conflicting forces play out. Staying informed, managing risk, and maintaining a long-term perspective are crucial for navigating this uncertain period. To learn more about the latest crypto market trends, explore our articles on key developments shaping the crypto market price action.

title: Federal Reserve Holds Steady: What This Means for the Cryptocurrency Market
body: The world of finance is constantly reacting to signals from major economic bodies, and few are watched as closely as the U.S. Federal Reserve . Recently, the Fed’s Federal Open Market Committee ( FOMC ) made a decision that, while widely anticipated, carries significant weight for markets globally, including the volatile cryptocurrency market . What Did the Federal Reserve Decide on Interest Rates? In its latest meeting, the Federal Reserve announced its decision to maintain the target range for the federal funds rate at 4.25% to 4.50%. This move was largely in line with market expectations, suggesting a period of holding steady after a series of aggressive rate hikes aimed at taming inflation. Here’s a quick breakdown of the key points from the announcement: Rate Stability: The federal funds rate remains unchanged, pausing the tightening cycle for now. Alignment with Expectations: The decision met the consensus view among economists and market participants. Focus on Data: The Fed reiterated that future decisions will depend on incoming economic data, particularly concerning inflation and employment. No Immediate Pivot: While rates are stable, this doesn’t necessarily signal an immediate pivot to rate cuts. The language suggests a readiness to adjust policy as needed. Understanding the Federal Reserve ‘s stance on interest rates is crucial because these rates influence borrowing costs across the entire economy, from mortgages to business loans. This, in turn, impacts consumer spending, investment, and overall economic growth. How Does the FOMC Influence the Cryptocurrency Market? The decisions made by the FOMC have a profound, albeit indirect, impact on the cryptocurrency market . Here’s why: Liquidity: Lower interest rates generally mean more liquidity in the financial system, as borrowing becomes cheaper. This can lead investors to seek higher returns in riskier assets like stocks and cryptocurrencies. Conversely, higher rates tighten liquidity, making riskier assets less attractive. Investor Sentiment: The Fed’s outlook on the economy shapes investor confidence. A stable or optimistic outlook can encourage investment, while concerns about recession or persistent inflation can lead to risk aversion. Dollar Strength: Monetary policy decisions, particularly on rates, affect the strength of the U.S. dollar. A stronger dollar can sometimes put downward pressure on assets like Bitcoin, which are often seen as alternative stores of value. Inflation Expectations: The Fed’s primary goal is price stability. How the market perceives the Fed’s ability to control inflation influences the narrative around assets like Bitcoin, which some view as an inflation hedge. The decision to hold rates steady, as announced by the FOMC , can be interpreted in several ways by the cryptocurrency market . On one hand, it removes the immediate pressure of another rate hike, which is generally seen as positive for risk assets. On the other hand, it signals that the Fed believes conditions still warrant keeping rates at restrictive levels to combat inflation, which isn’t necessarily bullish. Navigating the Cryptocurrency Market Amidst Monetary Policy Shifts The current phase of monetary policy , characterized by stable but elevated interest rates , presents both opportunities and challenges for participants in the cryptocurrency market . Benefits: Reduced Uncertainty: A predictable Fed decision removes one layer of market anxiety, potentially allowing other factors to drive crypto price action. Stable Macro Backdrop (for now): A pause in rate hikes suggests the Fed is comfortable with the current trajectory, offering a degree of stability in the macroeconomic environment compared to periods of aggressive tightening. Challenges: Continued Tight Conditions: Rates remain high, meaning the cost of capital is still elevated. This can constrain growth in speculative assets and potentially impact crypto-related businesses relying on financing. Data Dependency: The Fed’s future moves are explicitly tied to data. Any negative surprises on inflation or employment could quickly shift the sentiment and policy outlook. Risk-Off Sentiment Lurking: Despite the pause, the underlying economic conditions that led to high rates (inflation) are still being monitored. A resurgence of inflation fears could trigger a return to risk-off behavior. Actionable Insights: Stay Informed: Pay close attention to future Fed announcements, press conferences, and economic projections (like the dot plot). Monitor Key Data: Keep an eye on inflation reports (CPI, PCE), employment data, and GDP figures, as these will heavily influence the Fed’s next steps. Understand Correlations: Be aware that while crypto has unique drivers, it is not immune to global macroeconomic forces and shifts in monetary policy . Manage Risk: Given the ongoing uncertainty and data dependency, maintaining a disciplined risk management strategy is crucial. The relationship between the Federal Reserve ‘s actions and the cryptocurrency market is complex and constantly evolving. While crypto enthusiasts often focus on technological advancements and adoption, ignoring the broader economic context set by institutions like the FOMC would be unwise. The Role of Monetary Policy in a Digital Age Monetary policy , traditionally focused on managing fiat currencies and banking systems, now operates in an environment where digital assets like cryptocurrencies exist. Central banks, including the Federal Reserve , are increasingly considering the implications of digital currencies, stablecoins, and the broader crypto ecosystem. While the direct tools of monetary policy (like setting interest rates ) primarily target the traditional financial system, their effects ripple outward. The liquidity, risk appetite, and inflation expectations influenced by the Fed’s decisions inevitably spill over into the crypto space. As the crypto market matures and becomes more integrated with traditional finance, this relationship is likely to strengthen. The Fed’s decision to hold rates steady can be seen as a moment of cautious observation. They are likely waiting to see the full effects of previous hikes on inflation and the economy before making their next move. This period of stability in monetary policy could provide a window for the cryptocurrency market to find its footing based on its own fundamentals, but it remains susceptible to shifts in the macro winds. Conclusion: Navigating the Macro Currents The Federal Reserve ‘s decision to keep interest rates unchanged was a non-event in terms of surprise, but a significant signal regarding the current state of monetary policy . The FOMC is in a holding pattern, balancing the need to combat inflation with the risks to economic growth. For the cryptocurrency market , this means the immediate headwind of rising rates has paused, but the broader environment of relatively tight liquidity and data dependency persists. Understanding the nuances of the Federal Reserve ‘s communications and monitoring key economic indicators is essential for anyone navigating the digital asset space. While crypto’s long-term potential is driven by innovation and adoption, its short-to-medium term trajectory will likely remain influenced by the powerful currents of global monetary policy . To learn more about the latest explore our article on key developments shaping the cryptocurrency market and monetary policy ‘s impact.

title: Robinhood Plans Blockchain-Based Trading for US Securities in Europe: Report
body: Robinhood is developing a blockchain-based platform that will allow retail investors in Europe to trade US securities, including stocks. Bloomberg reported Wednesday that the initiative will likely be launched in partnership with a digital-asset firm. Both Arbitrum, a blockchain overlaid on Ethereum, and Solana have been under consideration for the collaboration, though discussions are still ongoing. This move to offer tokenized US securities aligns with a broader trend in the financial industry. As global institutions explore blockchain’s potential, they see an opportunity to cut costs tied to traditional trading infrastructure while benefiting from greater transparency and standardization. The company didn’t return Cryptonews’ request for comment by press time. While everyone's focused on Jerome Powell, Robinhood is evaluating whether to use Solana or Arbitrum as the backbone of a new service that will let European retail investors trade US stocks. The long-term outlook for crypto is dependent on crypto-specific fundamentals, not 25bps… pic.twitter.com/jj4VK68oXY — Matt Hougan (@Matt_Hougan) May 7, 2025 Robinhood Looks to Expand EU Services with Brokerage License in Lithuania Robinhood, which currently only offers cryptocurrency trading to its European Union customers, recently secured a brokerage license in Lithuania. This will allow the company to expand its services within the EU to include stock trading. In addition, Robinhood is in the process of closing a deal to acquire crypto exchange Bitstamp , which would enable the company to offer crypto-linked derivatives under Bitstamp’s MiFID multilateral trading facility license. Despite Crypto Growth, Robinhood Aims to Broaden Revenue Sources The company has enjoyed strong financial performance, with a 50% jump in revenue for the first quarter of the year . A big chunk of this growth came from its cryptocurrency business, driven by a surge in trading volumes as investors sought to hedge against market volatility. As a result, the platform’s profits more than doubled, surpassing analysts’ expectations. Despite its reliance on crypto for now, CEO Vlad Tenev said that Robinhood is working to diversify its business. The company plans to reduce its dependence on crypto transaction volumes over time. “We’re focused on diversifying the business outside of crypto,” Tenev explained during the earnings call. “This will make us less reliant on crypto transaction volumes in the future.” With its latest move, Robinhood aims to tap into the growing interest in blockchain-based financial products. The company’s European expansion, which is backed by Lithuania’s regulatory framework, could serve as a crucial stepping stone in its broader international growth strategy. However, the platform’s success will hinge on its ability to attract a substantial user base and navigate evolving market dynamics in the EU. The post Robinhood Plans Blockchain-Based Trading for US Securities in Europe: Report appeared first on Cryptonews .

title: Did the SEC Fear XRP’s Collapse? Leaked Emails Expose 2021 Doubts About Ripple
body: The post Did the SEC Fear XRP’s Collapse? Leaked Emails Expose 2021 Doubts About Ripple appeared first on Coinpedia Fintech News Ripple’s long legal battle with the U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC) may have wrapped up in the company’s favor, but newly released documents show how deeply the agency once worried about the future of XRP. According to a fresh batch of files obtained through a Freedom of Information Act (FOIA) request by Coinbase, SEC officials were actively debating the stability and security classification of various crypto assets back in 2021. Among them, XRP was very much on their radar. As reported by The Block, in one internal email, SEC officials questioned what might happen if Ripple, the company behind XRP, suddenly “walked away” or “disappeared.” The agency appeared concerned about what risks could surface for the XRP blockchain in such a scenario — a rare behind-the-scenes glimpse into how regulators were viewing crypto projects under pressure. At the time, the SEC had already kicked off a major lawsuit against Ripple, accusing it of operating illegally by selling XRP as an unregistered security. While Ripple has since emerged victorious from that battle — even winning back some of the penalties it had previously paid — these newly uncovered emails show just how uncertain regulators were about the decentralization and resilience of the XRP network itself. The revelations come amid a broader series of disclosures this week from Coinbase, which published dozens of SEC communications related to crypto oversight as part of its own ongoing legal standoff with the agency. This isn’t the first time SEC deliberations on crypto assets have made headlines. The same document dump also revealed how, in 2023, the New York State Attorney General had formally asked the SEC to declare Ethereum’s Ether (ETH) a security — a request that was ultimately ignored.
